Reddit says it has used the social media company’s content without permission to train its AI models . The lawsuit alleges that Anthropic attempted to access Reddit data more than 100,000 times since last July . Anthropic says it disagrees with Reddit's claims and will “defend ourselves vigorously”  The AI startup Anthropic “bills itself as the white knight of the AI industry,” Reddit said in the lawsuit . The social media platform called Anthropic’s emphasis on trust and honesty “empty marketing gimmicks”  This suit is among a flurry of high-profile complaints against AI companies including Meta Platforms Inc. and OpenAI . Reddit would prefer to reach an agreement outside of court, Lee said .  Trump Considers Deporting Migrants to Rwanda after the UK Decides Not to . Apple will host its annual developers conference on June 9 at its headquarters in Cupertino, Calif., giving us a glimpse at the software updates it has planned for the year ahead . Wall Street investors and analysts will be far more interested in how Apple is working to better compete in the AI space .  Siri is supposed to be able to tap into your personal information and preferences to provide helpful responses to a wide range of queries . The most famous example Apple cited was asking Siri when someone's flight would land at the airport . Apple kicked off its AI push at WWDC 2024, revealing its Writing Tools and Genmoji features .  Apple is "digging itself out of a hole," analyst Patrick Moorhead says . It will need to show developers that it's giving them the tools necessary to develop AI apps for its platforms . "They got caught flat-footed with generative AI," analyst says .  Apple Intelligence is only available for the iPhone 15 Pro, the iPhone 16 line, and various iPads and Macs . Apple said the software is too resource-intensive for older iPhones to handle . The move could help software makers design new, exciting offerings that eventually drive sales .  OpenAI and Jony Ive's upcoming AI-based consumer product could be a formidable threat to Apple . The inclusion of Ive, who helped lead Apple's design team for years and ushered in the age of the iPhone, means OpenAI's offering could prove to be formidable threat .

The company’s clear vision for cloud computing, AI integration, and enterprise solutions keeps its leadership team tightly aligned . Wedbush Fund Advisers launches the Dan IVES Wedbush AI Revolution ETF . The fund will trade on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol IVES . It tracks 30 companies handpicked from Ives's "AI Revolution Theme"  IVES debuts within a saturated market, with roughly 4,000 ETFs available in the US alone . The fund will be available to both institutional and retail investors . Holdings include major AI players like Nvidia, Microsoft, and defense-focused firms like Palantir .  Dan Ives told Yahoo Finance, "There is only one that encompasses my investing team and the research that investors have trusted me to deliver" focus on the AI theme or employ AI-driven strategies .

Shareholder proposals asking Microsoft and Meta to assess Bitcoin for corporate treasuries rejected by over 99% of voters . Both companies' boards opposed the proposals, claiming they already review all cash management options including cryptocurrencies . The Bitcoin platform has earned some Street cred in recent years .  Thesespot Bitcoin fundshave nearly $121 billion of digital assets under management in June 2025 . Some of the most significant buys of these ETFs come from old-school financial giants such as Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley .  Bitcoin-based investments used to be pure high-risk ideas, with sky-high beta values indicating massive volatility . Low beta values signify below-average price swings, while negative ones belong to investments that often move in direct opposition to the stock market .  Activist investors have been asking some of the world's largest tech titans to buy some Bitcoin . Two different groups asked Microsoft and Meta Platforms to just look into the idea . Both companies opposed these proposals . Microsoft's board recommended shareholders to vote against the measure .  Microsoft shareholders voted on Bitcoin proposals on their proxy statements . The Bitcoin proposal received just 0.55% "yea" approval . The top performers got more than 30% approval ratings, but Bitcoin was barely there .  Some investors may simply be satisfied with the ordinary review of financial management options . At the same time, there's some truth to the anti-Bitcoin sentiment seen in these lopsided votes . The vast majority of Microsoft and Meta Platforms shares are held by institutional investors . Palantir Technologies closed at a record for a third consecutive day Tuesday, pushing their gain for the year to 76% . Shares of the data-analysis software company close at record for the third straight day Tuesday . While that’s good enough for second-best on the S&P 500 Index, it has a staggering 205 times projected earnings over the next 12 months . That's a hefty premium to the broader market's 22 times .  Palantir’s cult-like momentum rally stands in sharp contrast to a lukewarm reception from Wall Street analysts . The stock has only eight buy equivalent ratings and is dominated by 16 holds, with six sells, making it one of the lowest rated S&P 500 stocks .  Palantir forecasts sales will rise to $3.9 billion for the calendar year 2025, a 36% increase from the previous year . This year’s free cash flow is forecast to top $1.5 billion, a more than 30% increase on the year .  Palantir was the third most active in the last week behind Tesla and Nvidia . The company has continued to land government contracts during the Trump administration . Wall Street analysts think the current rally has gotten ahead of itself .  Palantir has an increasingly high bar to clear to keep the stock grinding higher . Anything short of outperformance could weigh on shares, as was seen in the brief selloff following last quarter’s earnings report . CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. shares fell after the cybersecurity company projected revenue for the current quarter that trailed estimates .  Manus unveiled a text-to-video generation feature, entering a competitive segment populated by rivals from OpenAI to China’s Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and Tencent Holdings Ltd. Broadcom Inc. began shipping a new version of its data center switch chips that can boost the efficiency of AI accelerators . Microsoft announced a $400 million investment to expand its artificial intelligence and cloud infrastructure in Switzerland . The company said the funding will support data center upgrades near Zurich and Geneva . Switzerland now ranks second globally in GitHub AI contributor share .  Microsoft said the investment extends its long-standing commitment to Switzerland's digital future . Microsoft said it will deepen partnerships with Switzerland Innovation Parks to accelerate commercialization of AI research and industrial applications . The company said it plans to train one million people in Switzerland by 2027 .  Microsoft said its Swiss operations are fully powered by renewable energy . The company also signed a six-year, 27,600-ton biogenic carbon removal and storage agreement with Swiss firm Neustark .  Microsoft said these efforts align with its global goal of becoming carbon negative, water positive, and zero waste by 2030 . Microsoft said it has a global goal to become carbon negative and water positive .

Marvell turned in strong Q1 results and issued solid guidance . The chipmaker has been a solid beneficiary of the AI infrastructure build-out . The company appears to have an opportunity to get involved with custom chips for Microsoft .  Investors are worried about the company's future relationship with Amazon . Marvell is continuing to work with Amazon on its next-generation custom AI chip . CEO Matt Murphy said he expects revenue from Amazon to continue to grow over a multiyear and multigenerational basis .  Marvell's overall revenue soared by 63% year over year to $1.9 billion, while its adjusted earnings per share surged from $0.24 a year ago . Data center revenue accounted for 76% of its sales in the quarter . Marvell is supposedly involved withMicrosoft's new custom AI chip called Maia .  Marvell saw a big improvement from the large year-over-year declines they experienced in fiscal 2025's Q4 . Consumer revenue climbed 50% year over year to $63 million, while enterprise networking revenue rose 16% to $178 million . Marvell management expects the recovery in the enterprise networking and carrier infrastructure markets to continue .  The company generated operating cash flow of $333 million for the quarter, and it repurchased $340 million in stock . Management guided for fiscal 2026 second-quarter revenue of $2 billion, plus or minus 5%, which represents year-over-year growth of about 57%.  Given the uncertainties, Marvell is a bit of a speculative stock . However, given its valuation and growth opportunities with Microsoft, I think risk-tolerant investors can take a small position .  If you invested $1,000 at the time of our recommendation,you’d have $865,550! The Motley Fool’s total average return is994% — a market-crushing outperformance compared to172% for the S&P 500 . NVIDIA is the world's most valuable company, boasting a market capitalization of $3.45 trillion . Since bottoming at just over $94 in early April, NVIDIA stock has soared nearly 50%, adding over $1 trillion in market cap in less than two months . That rally was supercharged by robust first-quarter earnings, continued strength in AI chip demand and expansion plans .  Data Center revenues jumped 73% year over year to $39.1 billion . Demand for NVIDIA’s AI chips, especially for large cloud providers and AI supercomputing, continues to surge . NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang said, "Countries around the world are recognizing AI as essential infrastructure"  NVIDIA is back in positive territory for the year, gaining 5% . CEO Jensen Huang revealed the company is considering the development of a new AI chip designed specifically for the Chinese market .  Analysts remain optimistic about the chipmaker’s growth prospects . The stock is currently trading at a PEG ratio of 1.15, much lower than the industry average of 2.18 . A host of evidence suggests AI/data center spending is still in its early innings . Vertiv's power solutions are a critical part of data center architecture . The company reported flat year-over-year order growth in the fourth quarter of 2024 .  Management at electrical connection and protection companynVent sees accelerating demand for its solutions . Vertiv itself reported earnings in late April, and management noted that its one-year pipeline was growing . Microsoft and another hyperscaler, Google, confirmed its capital spending plans for 2025 and stated that it was "definitely" increasing its spending .  Vertiv is already working on the power equipment necessary to work with the next generation of Nvidia's platforms for data centers to be released in 2027 . Nvidia's recent results confirmed that the company's underlying demand remains in growth mode . Chipmaker Nvidia (NVDA) regained its title as the world's most valuable company on Tuesday . Nvidia stock has gained around 50% since hitting a 12-month low of just over $94 in early April, adding more than $1tn to the company's market capitalisation .  Shares in cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike (CRWD) slid 6.3% in pre-market trading on Wednesday . The company posted adjusted earnings per share of $0.73 for the quarter, compared to a Bloomberg consensus estimate . However, the stock fell due to a weaker-than-expected second quarter outlook .  US telehealth company Him & Hers (HIMS) closed Tuesday's session 3.6% in the red but were up 2.7% in pre-market trading on Wednesday . This came after the company announced that it would be acquiring European telehealth platform Zava in an all-cash deal .  Sales for the year were down 18% on an organic basis to €984.6m (£827.92m) However, share in Rémy Cointreau surged more than 6% on Wednesday morning .  WH Smith said travel revenue was up 7% in the 13 weeks to the end of May . The company said it was on track to complete the sale of its UK high street business to Modella Capital . Meta Platforms is generating strong growth as its AI capabilities boost advertising revenue . The company delivered an impressive Q1, helping to brush aside market concerns about a shifting economy . The stock's several advantages relative to its "Magnificent Seven" peers may help it outperform in the second half of 2025 .  Meta Platforms distinguishes itself through pioneering innovation in social media, with over 3.4 billion monthly active users across its ecosystem, including Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp . Unlike hyperscalers likeMicrosoftandAmazon, whose AI strategies depend on selling cloud-based AI services to external clients, Meta's strength lies in directly applying its AI models to enhance its core advertising business .  In the first quarter of 2025, revenue rose 16% year over year . Net income soared 35% to a record $16.6 billion, or $6.43 in earnings per share . Despite higher AI investment, Meta generated $10.3 billion in free cash flow . Wall Street analysts anticipate 14% revenue growth for 2025 and 2026 .  Meta Platforms stands out as a top AI stock because of its attractive valuation . With a forward price-to-earnings (P/E) ratio of 25, Meta trades at a large discount to its Magnificent Seven peers .  Meta Platforms stock is a great option for investors seeking to build a diversified portfolio with exposure to high-level themes in technology and AI . While internet giantAlphabetis the exception, trading at a forward P/E of 18, it faces significant regulatory scrutiny . Palantir's AIP is enabling enterprises to deploy autonomous AI agents that drastically compress decision timelines . The company’s AIP bootcamps, short, intensive training programs designed to help clients implement the platform, have surged in popularity .  AIG said its agentic AI ecosystem with Palantir, Anthropic, and AWS can accelerate the underwriting process up to 5X. and increase productivity not by percentages, but by multiples . Walgreens deployed AI-powered workflows to 4,000 stores in just eight months .  Palantir’s AIP uniquely powers core operational decisions in ways Salesforce, Microsoft and Google have yet to match . The stock has surged a whopping 76% year to date, outperforming the industry's 10% rally . PLTR trades at a forward price-to-sales ratio of 71.64 . Meta Platforms is signing a 20-year deal to buy nuclear power from Constellation Energy . The deal will extend the life of Constellation's Clinton Clean Energy Center for two more decades .  Meta Platforms is signing a 20-year PPA for the entire output of Constellation's Clinton Clean Energy Center -- 1,121 megawatts . The deal begins in June 2027 and will support the relicensing of this nuclear energyfacility .  Meta's deal with Constellation Energy likely won't be its last nuclear power deal . The Clinton Clean Energy Center has been at risk of being shut down . Meta says it's in final discussions with a short list of other potential projects .  Meta's agreement to buy all the power produced from that plant will extend its economic life for another two decades . Last year, Microsoft signed a 20-year PPA for 100% of the capacity of the company's Crane Clean Energy Center . Growing demand for nuclear energy from technology companies is helping power a surge in Constellation Energy's earnings .  Meta Platforms is a game-changing technology that could significantly increase productivity . Constellation Energy is an interesting way to invest in the AI megatrend alongside companies like Meta and Microsoft .
